name: An Absolutely Terrible Girlfriend
description:
Play as April May, the titular terrible girlfriend in this Twitter themed shoot-em-up as you ignore your girlfriend and indulge in the electronic addiction that fame has suddenly granted you. This game was created for a school project, and is based on the book An Absolutely Remarkable Thing by Hank Green.

===========================================================

This is  Brand Store Brand Studio's first game, and we hope you like it. 

Mark - Coding

Zack - Art
